definition: to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: This will launch XCOR into the emerging space tourism market, estimated at over a half-billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 公司將投資超過五億美金，來拓展空間旅遊市場。

sentences.english: The prestress method should be developed in the study of the rotor dynamics problems.
sentences.chinese: 預應力法在轉子動力學問題的研究中可進一步拓展。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope of fully cooper-ate with old and new cutomers. to achieve mutual progress.
sentences.chinese: 同時誠望與各新老客戶通力合作，共同拓展。

sentences.english: The three expansion stages of early ancient seal character lines .
sentences.chinese: 早期大篆線條拓展的三個階段。

sentences.english: Washington's backing allowed the airlines to expand into cargo and passenger service.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓的支持讓航空公司拓展到貨物和旅客的服務。

sentences.english: They help to open man's perception and expand his approaches to creativity.
sentences.chinese: 他們能夠幫助解放人的感知力，拓展人的創造能力。

sentences.english: And last, cultural industry needs to be expanded and economic culture integration carried forward.
sentences.chinese: 第四要拓展文化產業，推進經濟文化一體化。

sentences.english: Quality is the base of Market, Goodwill erected by fervid service.
sentences.chinese: 以質量拓展市場，熱情服務樹信譽。

sentences.english: Thee-marketplace expands continuously with the development of E-commerce.
sentences.chinese: 電子商務的發展，促使電子交易市場領域不斷的拓展。

sentences.english: This study extended the choices of explants for wheat tissue culture.
sentences.chinese: 本研究拓展了作爲小麥組織培養的外植體範圍。

sentences.english: The bank would like to expand further into rural markets.
sentences.chinese: 進出口銀行希望進一步拓展到農村市場。

sentences.english: In fact, there are many other publishers working hard to develop new areas like FLTRP.
sentences.chinese: 其實，如同外研社這樣大力拓展新領域的還有很多。

sentences.english: We will constantly deepen and expand cooperation between Guangdong, Hong Kong and Macao.
sentences.chinese: 不斷拓展粵港澳三地合作的深度和廣度。
你瘋了似地拓展你的交際網。

sentences.english: Here to expand the vision, learn not learn a lot of books of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 在這搭拓展了視閾，學到很多書本里學不到的常識。

sentences.english: And the means for rotary missile wind tunnel measuring pressure test is aggrandized.
sentences.chinese: 拓展了旋轉彈風洞測壓實驗手段。

definition: to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
